content.2: Pass ye unto Calneh, and see; and from thence go ye to Hamath the great: then go down to Gath of the Philistines:
content.3: Ye that put far away the evil day, and cause the seat of violence to come near;
content.4: That lie upon beds of ivory, and stretch themselves upon their couches, and eat the lambs out of the flock, and the calves out of the midst of the stall;
content.5: That chant to the sound of the viol,
content.6: That drink wine in bowls, and anoint themselves with the chief ointments: but they are not grieved for the affliction of Joseph.
content.7: Therefore now shall they go captive with the first that go captive, and the banquet of them that stretched themselves shall be removed.
content.9: And it shall come to pass, if there remain ten men in one house, that they shall die.
